transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call. Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello. Haan sir.
Executive: Sir namaste Abhishek baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Ji sir.
Customer: Hello. Sir free hai abhi aap baat karne ke liye? Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Free hai sir abhi aap baat karne ke liye? Haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir aawaz check kariye aapki. Ab aa rahi hai aapko aawaz aa rahi hai abhi clear? Haan ji aawaz aa rahi hai haan ji.
Executive: Haan, theek hai. Sir jo aapne jo ticket open kara hua tha uska kuch sudhar hua hai sir calls wagera aa rahi hai abhi kya?
Customer: Haan, call toh kal toh ek aayi bhai sirf.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek cheez aur hai sir ek cheez aur batana chah raha tha calls aane start ho jayengi ki aapke pichle mahine ka jo buyed consumption tha na thoda activity aapka pichle mahine proper tha haan 29 days aap active the 152 buyed aapne consume kiya hai. Toh is mahine consumption thoda kam ho gaya aapka. Aapne abhi tak 24 din hi aap active hai aur 14 buyed hi consume kara hai aapne.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh aur jo pichle mahine ki baat kare toh aapka jo city consumption tha city wise consumption tha woh 30-40 cities mein tha. Abhi aap sirf 20 cities mein consume kar rahe hain buyed.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Hai na? Haan toh agar jitna jyada aap cities wise buyed consume karoge toh utni calls inquiries aur badhegi aapki.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapko main WhatsApp bhi kar de raha hu aapke haan abhi aap Mumbai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Lucknow Kolkata, Patna sabse jyada buyed consume kar rahe ho aap.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh pichle mahine jo tha woh aapka takriban 30-40 buyed mein consumption tha toh us hisab se inquiries calls bhi badh rahi thi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Toh is mahine aapka thoda activity kam hua tha. Kuch reason hai inactivity hone ka sir?
Customer: Pata nahi maine toh consume toh itni kari hai jaise main pehle karta aa raha tha.
Executive: Nahi hamare paas abhi aapko ab ek baar WhatsApp open kariye aap ek baar WhatsApp open kariye aapko main bhej deta hu. Ji. Kyunki pichle mahine pichle mahine consumption sara bahut aapka bahut badhiya tha.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Haan aaj 28 din ho gaye aapne is mahine chaar chaar din activity kam hui hai.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Haan aap dekho ek baar ye bhi maine bheja hai aapko dekhiye. Aap dekhoge na pichle mahine aap 29 din active the aur 152 buyed consume kare the. Hai na?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Aur aaj is mahine thoda activity kam hua hai 24 din mein sirf 14 buyed consume kara hai. Isliye sir dekho kaam kaise karte hai inquiries calls jitne jyada sehar ke aap buyed consume karenge aap toh utni utni utni jyada aapko inquiries calls bhi aayengi.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh aap try karo ki ye aap ye kya bolte hai seven sisters mein north east mein aap deal karte hai ki nahi hai aap? Kis mein sir?
Customer: North east mein north east mein.
Executive: Haan Assam ji isko.
Customer: North east mein. Toh aap location wise bhi aap expand karne ki koshish karo sir location wise bhi aap expand karne ki koshish karo bahut sare bahut sare aise sehar hai jisko aap consume karne ki aavashyakta hai jaise Chhattisgarh Chhattisgarh mein bhi aapne ek bhi buyed consume nahi kari aap free bhi de sakte ho. Chhattisgarh hai aur Madhya Pradesh ke bahut sare sehar hai Bengal hai Bengal mein sirf Kolkata aapne consume kara hai bahut sare location hai Bengal mein free. Hai na? Delhi mein bhi bahut sare sehar hai Rajasthan ke bhi sehar hone chahiye the Rajasthan ke bhi itne nahi hai sirf Jodhpur hai.
Customer: Theek sir theek theek.
Executive: Toh aap jyada se jyada consume karne ki koshish karo aur is week ka feedback kaisa raha hai buyed aapne jo consume kari hai conversion achhe se aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji ji.
Executive: Matlab convert ho raha hai na bulk ki convert ho raha hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Koi negotiation wagera ki ya phir koi aur dikkat?
Customer: Nahi abhi toh sahi aa raha hai phir dobara se starting sahi ho gayi phir. Abhi jaisa aapne.
Executive: Jyada se jyada consume jyada karoge utna achha aayega phir.
Customer: Dekho sir aapke jo buyed ka aapke paas milta hai balance aapko pata hoga 34 milta hai weekly hai na? Ji ji. Aur 34 ko agar hum mahine mein aapko chaar week hote hai agar 34 ko aap karoge toh 136 hote hai aur ek do din extra bhi jaate hai beech mein. Theek hai toh aapko kam se kam 10 10 buyed extra milte hai. Toh 136 buyed aap aapke weekly milte hai aur ek do din jo extra jaate hai unme bhi aapko buyed ka balance milta hai. Jitna jyada consume karoge utna proper proper tarike se consume karoge utne proper tarike se inquiry calls bhi aayegi. Jo jitna jaise maine bataya tha package mein aisa hai ki jis sehar se aap consume karoge us sehar mein aapki visibility dikhegi aapko maine starting mein bataya tha.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hai na? Jis sehar se aap consume karoge us sehar se woh karegi toh aap isko aise aap bhuna sakte ho ki jis sabse jyada jo jo main cities hai jahan pe wedding ki education ki demand jyada hai aap Google pe bhi open karke location dekh sakte ho ki aapke product line se demand kahan hai. Toh aap har jagah consume karo location filter laga ke.
Customer: Theek sir theek.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh aur koi dikkat pareshani toh nahi hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi toh nahi.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai aur kuch dikkat hai toh aap mujhe call kar lena sir theek hai? Theek hai sir theek hai haan. Theek hai thank you so much sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fewer buyleads.

- Customer's buyed consumption has decreased.



Resolution:

- Executive shared consumption details via WhatsApp.

- Executive suggested consuming buyed location-wise.

- Executive suggested consuming more buyed.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, consumption, cities, whatsapp, location
